short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click to enable Google Advance Search with your preferred language or country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allow you to trigger Google Advance search from the context menu so that you can narrow your search result to your preferred language or country easily.

To use it, right click at anywhere when you are on a Google search result page. Then put your mouse on the "Narrow Search Result" menu and choose the options. It will put the extra URL parameters automatically for you and then narrow down the search result based on your preference.

Attribution: Icons are made by Darius Dan (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/darius-dan) from Flaticon (www.flaticon.com).
